Params: {3: 'With the cessation of the 170th Corrupted activity signal, silence returns and takes over the noise.'}
{3: 'The wounded Lucia lays disheveled over the heaps of broken Corrupted parts. Her chest heaving irregularly in an attempt to calm her own breathing.'}
{2: 'The Corrupted are still gathering this way...', 3: '9'}
{3: 'Lucia emptily stares at the dancing embers before her.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The Anti-Punishing Serum for this mission... How many do you have left?'}
{3: 'In truth, the one just now was the last...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "You don't have to hide it for me."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "From your first serum injection, I've already been counting, Commandant..."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '42 minutes... since your last serum injection...'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'If we run out of serum, Commandant, your human body will not be able to survive here.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "The other members of Gray Raven have yet to arrive... I'm the only one who can buy time for you to retreat..."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'But the pain reception is affecting my performance, Commandant.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Please authorize the temporary disabling of my pain reception and allow me to continue fighting.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "What's the matter...? Are you worried that if I continue on like this, my M.I.N.D. will permanently deviate from the human consciousness model?"}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "You're always one to care about these..."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's fine, Commandant, I believe in you. As long as we keep our consciousness linked, your Mind Beacon will allow me to stay human."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "As for this rash decision... I'll report back to you for disciplinary actions when we return to HQ."}
{2: '... (Allow Lucia to turn off pain receptors)', 3: '35'}
{3: "Until Lucia's consciousness comes back online, she will have to be protected."}
{3: 'So, there is only one thing left to do—'}
{3: 'The Corrupted frames are riddled with bullets all over, yet they show no signs of slowing down.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'And the next instant, the scintillating blade of the Corrupted is already raised high—', 4: '1'}
{3: '—Then caught it before the blade had a chance to fall—'}
{3: '—And a gut punch follows, dismantling the near-fractured frame of the Corrupted.'}
{3: 'Before the Corrupted could stabilize itself from the missed leap, its head is detached by a roundhouse kick. The body then quickly collapses.'}
{3: 'Even so, the remaining Corrupted continue to converge...'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Report. Construct Lucia is now ready for battle.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Commandant... Thank you, I'll handle this from now on."}
{3: 'No longer fettered by pain, Lucia spins through the battlefield—'}
{3: '—destroying Corrupted with an almost terrifying alacrity...'}
{3: 'Yet their numbers show no signs of decrease...'}
